attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like the TV licence scrapped for all those people who chose to view their favourite television programmes through either SKY or cable.

The BBC does not need the money as it makes a fortune from selling of the programmes we the British public pay for.  Their commercial department is selling programmes like Only Fools and Horses, Red Dwarf, etc. on DVD and we’re the silly people buying these!  We’re actually paying twice!

The TV licence is just legalised theft on the part of the government (all parties)

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not simply your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
